name: Light (itch) (Elf-Lord Games)
description: You are a light inside a computer-controlled LED matrix. The Programmer has selected you to be His light in the darkness for all the world to see. Unfortunately, you have an enemy who wants darkness. Through many trials and hardships, you try to figure out what the Programmer’s will is for your life. Along the way, you meet several fellow lights, and though your path is not the same as theirs, your goal is the same: to serve the Programmer. You will fail and go out, but the Programmer forgives you and provides the energy you need to get back up and persevere. His plan is the best and always will be. Along the way, you will see pieces of His plan, but it won’t be until the end of your life when you will finally be able to see His master plan for all the lights in this world. Until then, you have to trust Him.
